mapper.select: select m_email, m_name, nvl(m_phone,'-') as m_phone, m_joindate, m_ipaddress, m_grade, m_point, nvl(m_gender,'-') as m_gender, m_garden from members
select sum(s_p_price*s_p_count) from shoplist where s_statement='구매 취소'
select s_p_title, sum(s_p_count) as s_p_count from shoplist where s_statement!='구매 취소' group by s_p_title order by 2 desc
select sum(s_p_count) from shoplist where s_statement!='구매 취소'
select count(distinct(s_orderno)) from shoplist where s_statement=#{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select s_orderno, s_email, s_phone, sum(s_p_price) as s_p_count from shoplist where s_statement=#{value} group by s_orderno, s_email, s_phone
mapper.update: update shoplist set s_statement=#{stat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where s_orderno=#{no}
mapper.select: select distinct(sb_orderno_seq) as s_orderno, sb_email as s_email, s_phone, sb_price as s_p_price from shoplist, subscribe where sb_email=s_email and sb_statement='입금 대기'
mapper.update: update subscribe set sb_statement=#{stat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where sb_orderno_seq=#{no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select g_herb, count(*) as g_temper from gardens group by g_herb
